message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll find it's a great investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $10,500.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $11,500. This is my final offer for now.
